title: Sunny, Bright 3BD Home, Backyard, Garage Parking
posting_body: ['Sunny, Bright 3BD Home, Backyard, Garage Parking', 'Property Address', '44 Tucker Ave - #44 | San Francisco, CA 94134', 'Available: 07/15/2022', 'Offered By', 'Vanguard Property Management', 'Description', 'This quiet, spacious Visitation Valley home sits atop a hill facing the San Bruno Mountains and South Bay.', 'Wood flooring on the main floor throughout.', 'The kitchen includes high end stainless steel appliances, and tile flooring.', 'The entire floor gets lots of light, including the kitchen, living room, and bedrooms.', 'Each bedroom is roomy, enough for a queen bed in the second bedroom, and a king bed in the main bedroom.', "Downstairs, there's a bonus room/den/office/guest room with brand new carpet and more storage space.", 'The garage is wide and accommodates one car along with room in the driveway for a second.', 'Enjoy your laundry facilities here as well.', 'This property is located in residential and suburban Visitacion Valley, close to the T line, and within walking distance to Bayview Park and John McLaren Park, where the views are even more magnificent.', 'Getting to the 101 going North or South is a breeze too!', 'CONTACT INFORMATION:', 'Jon Knott (DRE #02011402)', 'vpm (at) vanguardsf (dot) com -', 'show contact info', 'PROPERTY SUMMARY:', 'Rent: $3,970/mo.', 'Security Deposit: 1.0 x Rent', 'Bedrooms: 2 Plus 3rd room perfect for office or guest room.', 'Bathrooms: 1', 'Parking: Garage parking', 'Pets: Small pets considered with addl.', 'deposit.', 'No pet rent!', 'Available Date: Now', 'Lease Term: 1 year', 'Utilities Included: None', 'Property Type: Unfurnished', 'Floors: Hardwood', 'Laundry:', 'In unit', 'Application Fee: $40 per person', 'Renters Insurance Required', 'Background check required', 'Credit 720+ Required', 'Features:', '- Stainless steel appliances in kitchen, including microwave, side by side refrigerator, 4 burner gas stove/oven, and dishwasher.', '- Granite counter tops and lots of kitchen storage', '- Washer/Dryer in the unit', '- Large bedrooms', '—Master - 12’6” x 11”', '—2nd Bedroom - 11’9” x 10’', '— 3rd room/office/den - 13” x 10’6”', '- Recessed lighting in the living room', '- Large 45’, level back yard complete with artificial turf and a spacious patio.', '- San Bruno Mountain and south bay water views', '- Excellent access to 101 and "T" line', 'RENTAL TERMS:', 'One year term required', 'Parking for one car is included', 'Small Pets negotiable with deposit and references', "Renter's Insurance required", 'Background check required', 'Credit 720+
